reviews.text: Good vibes, value for money food, excellent service and supporting a good cause! Will be back and will recommend to others üòä

Inedible.

Social enterprise, they tried with a friendly approach, the eggs were ok, the salad was replaced without dressing as requested. The prices are reasonable like food court. But I have to score it on whether I return or recommend.

It's probably a good place to come for a coffee which are affordable.

The score is meant to represent a chance to improve and it is judged on just one dish.

Super comfy place to chill, staffs are friendly and the delicious food are affordable. I had coke float, Nasi lemak Royale and truffle fries ü§§ all for around $23 Definitely coming back with family and friends. Recommend 100%

Place is awesome,  clean n well maintained.  Service is very good.  Nice place n everyone should try.
